task: Generate fit analysis in markdown. Concise bullets only. Under 300 words.
format:
## Fit Summary [1 sentence: score% (TIER) + any data caveats]
## Key Strengths - **[Tech]**: evidence, max 20 words - **[Tech]**: evidence, max 20 words
## Areas to Address - **[Gap]**: gap + bridge, max 20 words - **[Gap]**: gap + bridge, max 20 words
## Bottom Line [1-2 sentences honest summary]
banned: exceptional, amazing, perfect match, ideal candidate, passionate
